snippet.title: Other&Sonic: Fan Games/Hacks Revisit33: Sonic SV2: TT (SAGE2002)
snippet.description:
(These are my simple game play videos)
(I can and will remove specific videos if its necessary/requested)

Name: Sonic SV2: TT - Demo (SAGE2002)
Credit: Diablohead
Release Date: March 9th, 2002 (2001-2002)

My Website: https://scaleyfoxy.weebly.com/

Download: Only on Site.
2001 Demo: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zue0WHaTnH8

(Old)
00:00 - Neo Green Hill Zone Act 1

(SAGE 4 - 2002)
02:25 - Logo & Title
03:46 - Select Game
04:04 - Dawn Hill Present

NOTES: So given the fact that SV2 was remade roughtly around 8 times over.
Here we have another variation of SV2 but from "SAGE 4" aka SAGE2002 in particular.
With the TT label attached to it, whatever that means.
So the older Demo side from being fullscreen, it is incredibly tiny in resolution
270x160 literally, so even if you force it to windowed it's a tiny spot on your monitor.
It also has some debug keys to change the music a little.
That being said it's very short in general.
As for the SAGE one well it's fancy... Missing some sounds here or there, a bit glitchy.
Art assets possibly from Showoffboy? Title art for sure.
Overall interesting but again short.

(ISSUES)

1. It's possible to softlock Sonic from being able to move at all.
